trans-unit.source: Configure
Folding Region End
Simple HTML5 starting point
Folding Region Start
HTML Language Server
VS Code now has built-in support for auto-renaming tags. Do you want to enable it?
Provides rich language support for HTML and Handlebar files
HTML Language Features
Enable/disable autoclosing of HTML tags.

A list of relative file paths pointing to JSON files following the [custom data format](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-html-languageservice/blob/master/docs/customData.md).
VS Code loads custom data on startup to enhance its HTML support for the custom HTML tags, attributes and attribute values you specify in the JSON files.
The file paths are relative to workspace and only workspace folder settings are considered.
List of tags, comma separated, where the content shouldn't be reformatted. `null` defaults to the `pre` tag.
Enable/disable default HTML formatter.
End with a newline.
List of tags, comma separated, that should have an extra newline before them. `null` defaults to `"head, body, /html"`.
Format and indent `{{#foo}}` and `{{/foo}}`.
Indent `<head>` and `<body>` sections.
Maximum number of line breaks to be preserved in one chunk. Use `null` for unlimited.
Controls whether existing line breaks before elements should be preserved. Only works before elements, not inside tags or for text.
Honor django, erb, handlebars and php templating language tags.
List of tags, comma separated, that shouldn't be reformatted. `null` defaults to all tags listed at https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#phrasing-content.
Keep text content together between this string.
Wrap when line length is exceeded, align attributes vertically.
Wrap attributes only when line length is exceeded.
Wrap attributes.
Wrap each attribute except first.
Wrap each attribute except first and keep aligned.
Wrap each attribute.
Preserve wrapping of attributes.
Preserve wrapping of attributes but align.
Alignment size when using 'force aligned' and 'aligned multiple' in `#html.format.wrapAttributes#` or `null` to use the default indent size.
Maximum amount of characters per line (0 = disable).
Show tag and attribute documentation in hover.
Show references to MDN in hover.
Enable/disable mirroring cursor on matching HTML tag.
Deprecated in favor of `editor.linkedEditing`
Controls whether the built-in HTML language support suggests HTML5 tags, properties and values.
Traces the communication between VS Code and the HTML language server.
Controls whether the built-in HTML language support validates embedded scripts.
Controls whether the built-in HTML language support validates embedded styles.
